channel.title: Sims on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Sims on Game6r

item.title: Game similar to The Sims Lego
item.description: Many people like Lego, and if you love it too, then it’s time to launch this exciting game. Here it is proposed to build your own city from the details of the designer. There are many different elements at your disposal, so you should show your imagination at the maximum level. The city will be great!

item.title: Sims drive car game
item.description: In this exciting game you have to turn into a car driver. Complete tasks and achieve the desired result. Tips that are displayed on the screen will help you navigate the gameplay. Your car will definitely be the most beautiful, powerful and fastest in the whole city. It will be great!
